abstract: You can conserve paper by saving receipts from Web purchases as PDF files instead of printing them.
snippet: You can conserve paper by saving receipts from Web purchases as PDF files instead of printing them.
lead_paragraph: You can conserve paper by saving receipts from Web purchases as PDF files instead of printing them. A free program, CutePDF, converts an onscreen Web receipt to a PDF file by just using the Print command and choosing “CutePDF Writer” as the printer. The program and a required helper script are both available at www.cutepdf.com and there are other similar programs around the Web; Microsoft has a free PDF add-on for Office 2007 at snipurl.com/3aqxp. In the Mac OS X Print dialog box, click the PDF button to see your PDF options  including a “Save PDF File to Web Receipts Folder” command.

headline.main: Tip of the Week: Conserving Paper
